text: Question 7 Consider the following three relations in a relational database. Employee(eld, Name), Brand(bId, bName), Own(eld,bId) Which of the following relational algebra expressions return the set of eIds who own all the brands? MSQ e Terd(Merapra(Own) /M 1q( Brand)) @ L14(Own) — Wz (Wara(Own) x Tya(Brand)) — Mg pra(Own)) Q Terd(Merapra(Own) /Ty 1a(Own)) @ L1 (Tera(Own) x Tyra(Own))/Myra( Brand)) GATE CSE 2022 Relational Algebra
